organizations.name: cas specialist post details disabled welfare dept nalgonda
recruitment advt & application form district hospital mahabubnagar

text: Click here for CAS Specialist Post Details Disabled Welfare Dept Nalgonda Jobs 2017 – Typist, Technical Subordinate & Other Posts: Disabled Welfare Dept, Nalgonda has published notification for the special recruitment of Typist, Technical subordinate, watchman, Junior Technical Officer, Trasser, Fisherman, laskar & Public Health Worker vacancies for PH candidates. Eligible candidates may apply in prescribed application format within 15 days from the date of advertisement. Other details like age limit, educational qualification, selection process & how to apply are given below… Disabled Welfare Dept Nalgonda Vacancy Details: Total No. of Posts: 17 Name of the Post: 2. Subordinate Officer/ Technical subordinate: 03 Posts 3. watchman: 02 Posts 4. Junior Technical Officer: 01 Post 5. Trasser: 01 Post 7. MPHA (Women): 01 Post 8. Laskar: 01 Post 9. Public Health Worker: 01 Post Age Limit: Candidates age limit should be between 18 – 54 years as on 01-01-2017. Educational Qualification : Candidates should possess Degree from a recognised University with typing & computer knowledge for Post No. 01, 7th Class for Post No. 02, 5th Class for Post No. 03, 10th Class and Diploma in Civil for Post No. 04, 05, 7th Class and IFTC Course for Post No 06, Intermediate and MPHA Course for Post No 07 and 5th Class for Post No. 08 & 09. Selection Process: Candidates will be selected based on merit for Post No. 01 & qualification, PH Percentage, employment seniority and age for Post No 02 to 09. How to Apply: Eligible candidates may send their bio data in prescribed format with self attested copies of educational qualification certificate, resident certificate, PH certificate, employment certificate in an envelope should be super scribed with “Application for Backlog Posts” by registered post or hand to the Jilla Collector, Collectorate Building, Nalgonda – 508 001 within 15 days from the date of advertisement. Important Dates: Last Date for Receipt of Application: Within 15 days from the date of advertisement. For more details like salary, experience, qualification & other information click on the link given below… Click here for Recruitment Advt & Application Form District Hospital Mahabubnagar Jobs 2017 – CAS Specialist Posts: Government of Telanagana, Office of the Superintendent, District Head Quarters Hospital, Mahabubnagar has published notification for the recruitment of CAS Specialist vacancies at District Hospital, Mahabubnagar and Area Hospital, Narayanpet on contract basis. Eligible candidates may apply in prescribed application format on or before 07-04-2017. Other details like age limit, educational qualification, selection process, application fee & how to apply are given below…. District Hospital Mahabubnagar Vacancy Details: Total No. of Posts: 10 Name of the Post: CAS Specialist a. Anesthesia: 02 Posts b. General Medicine: 04 Posts C. Pulmonary Medicine: 04 Posts Age Limit: Candidates age limit should be between 18 – 44 years as on 01-07-2016. Age relaxation is applicable to 05 years for S.Cs., S.Ts & BCs, 03 years for Ex Service men & 10 years for Disabled persons. Educational Qualification : Candidates should possess MD (Anesthesia) DA for Sl No a, MD in General Medicine for Sl No b & DM in Pulmonary or MD in Chest Disease, DTCD for Sl No c with relevant experience. Selection Process: Candidates will be selected based on merit and weightage for age. How to Apply: Eligible candidates may send their filled application in prescribed format with 01 Photograph duly pasted on the application form along with self attested copies of date of birth certificate, educational qualification certificate, registration certificate, caste certificate, study certificate, PH certificate, adhar card, bank account pass book and Self Addressed stamp affixed envelope cover to the Superintendent, District Head Quarters Hospital, Mahabubnagar on or before 07-04-2017 by 05:00 pm. Last Date for Receipt of Application: 07-04-2017 by 05:00 pm. For more details like salary, experience, reservation, duration & other information click on the link given below….
